metadata.title: CVE-2017-18214 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low
metadata.description: The moment module before 2.19.3 for Node.js is prone to a regularexpression denial of service via a crafted date string, a differentvulnerability than CVE-2016-4055.

criterions.comment: node-moment: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
